summary: A fast-paced socially relevant political drama that revolves around the struggles of an ordinary citizen against crime and political corruption.
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Tamannaah Bhatia|Prakash Raj|Ali|Brahmanandam|Kriti Kharbanda|Srinivasa Rao Kota|Tanikella Bharani|M.S. Narayana|Narra Srinivas|Scarlett Mellish Wilson
title: Cameraman Gangatho Rambabu
